## WrapApolloProvider() function

&gt; This export is only available in React Client Components

Creates an ApolloProvider for streaming SSR.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function WrapApolloProvider<ExtraProps>(TransportProvider: DataTransportProviderImplementation<ExtraProps>): WrappedApolloProvider<ExtraProps>;
```

</td><td>

The transport provider to be used. This could e.g. be a `ManualDataTransport` created by `buildManualDataTransport`<!-- -->, or a fully custom implementation of `DataTransportProviderImplementation`<!-- -->.
